title: President Donald J. Trump is Modernizing America’s Water Resource Management and Infrastructure – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
October 14, 2020
Council on Environmental QualityAmerica’s water infrastructure must be effectively managed and modernized to meet the needs of current and future generations of Americans.
						President Donald J. Trump					MODERNIZING AMERICA’S WATER INFRASTRUCTURE: President Trump is taking bold action to advance critical water infrastructure projects.  IMPROVING THE NATION’S WATER RESOURCE MANAGEMENT: President Trump is promoting efficient and effective interagency coordination by Federal agencies. CREATING OPPORTUNITIES FOR AMERICAN WATER WORKERS: President Trump is enhancing and rebuilding our Nation’s water sector workforce to combat a critical shortage.
